name: ScienceHistoryofTheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Science History of The Day keeps you informed in your flash briefing of an important science event that happened in history. For the science, technology, and history fan, it will help you impress friends and family with your knowledge. Great for kids, too!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
